What are the genetic changes related to dihydrolipoamide dehydrogenase deficiency ?,"Mutations in the DLD gene cause dihydrolipoamide dehydrogenase deficiency. This gene provides instructions for making an enzyme called dihydrolipoamide dehydrogenase (DLD). DL
